page.title: 16CHURCH & COMMUNITY: L'BORO
page.content: {St Mary in Charnwood} is a small Anglican Church, part of the Parish of Emmanuel. It has its own services, Church Warden, Council and parish_ ioners.It is served by the Rector and Curates of Emmanuel and is linked to the Loughborough Council of Churches. {Holywell Free Church}has worshipped at the school for over l5 years but opened its own Church in 1985 on adjacent land. It has no denomina_ tional ties but is linked to the Fellowship of Evangelical Churches. The{Priory Public House,}built in l936 opens every lunch time and evening to serve local people.It replaced a hotel across the road near to Longcliffe Hall. Meals are served at lunchtime. There is no music and no hotel accom_ modation. Charitable functions are held, notably the Priory Show for fruit, flowers and vegetables.
